style: Whimsical, imaginative, and enchanting writing style with detailed, descriptive, and vivid language.

L1.name: Entrance of Fairy Garden
L1.overview: A lush entrance with a shimmering fairy sign welcoming the player to the enchanted garden.

L2.name: Sunflower Grove
L2.overview: A field of towering sunflowers gently swaying in the breeze with hidden paths.

L3.name: Crystal Fountain
L3.overview: A majestic crystal fountain known for its rejuvenating properties.

L4.name: Twilight Glade
L4.overview: A serene glade filled with bioluminescent plants, illuminating the shadows in a soft glow.

L5.name: Whispering Woods
L5.overview: A forest with sentient, talking trees that share ancient riddles and legends.

L6.name: Mystical Grotto
L6.overview: A concealed grotto humming with magical energy and hidden wisdom.

L7.name: Celestial Observatory
L7.overview: A celestial observatory nestled high above the garden, granting views of the cosmos.

C1.name: Lyra the Fairy Queen
C1.overview: A regal and wise ruler of the Fairy Garden who seeks to restore balance.

C2.name: Bramble the Talking Tree
C2.overview: A cherry tree in the Whispering Woods who seeks to enlighten travelers with riddles.

I1.name: Enchanted Amulet
I1.overview: A dazzling amulet imbued with the power to reveal hidden paths.

I2.name: Fountain Crystal
I2.overview: A rare crystal shard retrieved from the Crystal Fountain with regenerative abilities.

Q1.name: Lyra's Quest for Balance
Q1.overview: Lyra the Fairy Queen needs assistance to restore balance in the Fairy Garden.

Q2.name: Bramble's Riddle Challenge
Q2.overview: Bramble the Talking Tree offers a challenge to solve his most mysterious riddles.
